name: 霍弘毅
objective: 本課程重點包括MLA論文格式以及論文引用形式。本課程內容同時也協助學生準備碩士論文寫作，亦將使修課同學學習什麼是一個好的論文題目、如何開始探究議題、以及用清楚及正確的英文改進論文初稿。
schedule: In the first half of the semester, students will review the basic rules for and mechanics of formal Word documents including Basic English Writing skills from sentences to paragraphs. In the second half of the semester, students have to put the skills to work to create a small but coherent essay with a Works Cited page.
scorePolicy:
Mid-Term 40%: Basic English Sentences with Style techniques and short coherent paragraphs.
Final 60%: Short Essay. 5 Paragraphs plus Works Cited. MLA Style.
materials: Dr Wall’s Guides to Grammar, Style, and Paragraphs. MLA Guides. Handouts.
